entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
